segments.text: I see the water gushing out of the sink uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's making such a filthy puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, foot in the mess, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How gross, water streaming down the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those kids are filthy thieves, sneaking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy on that rickety stool, hand in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl reaching up, begging for some.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole kitchen is turning into a disaster zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The nice garden outside can't hide the sloppiness inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone has to clean up this nonsense.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's all so avoidable and annoying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Ugh, the towel might get soaked too.
segments.speaker: PAR
